column2: "Far too many ARKS members fail to keep their stuff properly organized. We can't let them slack off like that, if you ask me."
"How can they be responsible for keeping all of us safe if they can't be responsible for their own junk?"
"What about you? You should go organize your stuff, while we're on the subject. Do it."
"Do what? Go organize your items at your Storage! Haven't you been listening? You'd best pay attention."
"Well, what are you waiting for? It's not rocket science. Go put my mind at ease, already."
